entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rigolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:06 AM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill minus 39 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 29. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 22. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 29.

entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. High minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Thursday 23 February 2023
